name: MTLCPUCacheMode
desc: Options for the CPU cache mode that define the CPU mapping of the resource.

items.name: case defaultCache
items.desc: The default CPU cache mode for the resource, which guarantees that read and write operations are executed in the expected order.

items.name: case writeCombined
items.desc: A write-combined CPU cache mode that is optimized for resources that the CPU writes into, but never reads.
